snippet: Under the leadership of Thomas J. Donohue, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce has exerted much more influence, spending more than three times as much as the second- biggest lobbyist last year.
lead_paragraph: Under the leadership of Thomas J. Donohue, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce has exerted much more influence, spending more than three times as much as the second- biggest lobbyist last year.

headline.seo: Biggest Lobbying Spenders in the U.S.
headline.main: Biggest Lobbying Spenders in the U.S.
